docs.title: About me
docs.text: My name is Taylor Singletary. I tend to work on developer-facing internet platforms.

docs.title: Work
docs.text:
• I'm currently a senior director of developer relations at Slack, where I've worked for 8 years.
  • Previously I worked in developer relations, product, and engineering for Clever, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
  • Connect with me on LinkedIn.

docs.title: Music
docs.text: • I make some mostly electronic music available on Soundcloud.

docs.title: For platform providers
docs.text:
• Developer relations anywhere - a template for starting or restarting developer relations teams
  • How We Design Our APIs at Slack - co-author; Slack Engineering Blog
    • Podcast: API Design - interview on APIs Unplugged
  • Masters of Product Change: Taylor Singletary - Slack - an interview with me on change management at scale.
  • A preserved unique developer education experience for Twitter - inspired by the Audobon field guides.
  • Writing great documentation - everything I thought I knew about great docs in 2016.
  • How I fail developers - anti-patterns you sometimes can't avoid when writing for developres, cathartically examined in poem-form
  • Productivity in developer relations - what does devrel do all day?

docs.title: Other writing
docs.text:
• I was on Twitter a bit. The archive is still available on something now called X.
  • There's quite a bit on everything2.com from my youth.
